name: Area 2+7²
description:
(NOTE: ON FIRST BOOT YOU WILL NEED TO GO TO SETTINGS TO TURN ON MUSIC)

Heavily inspired by the Henry Stickmin games and the Area 51 raid event

This is also a pretty short game, around a few minutes to play through

Try to break into Area 2+7² to rescue those aliens! You will have 2 items to use for every problem, one will progress you forward, and the other won't (but it would be pretty funny).

Controls:

Use the mouse to click on the choices when they show up

Creators:

PotatoNato: Coding, Art, Concept

Roshi: Art, Music, Ideas

Assets:

Bwomp Sound effect: Spongebob (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hbmk1AKKcPc)

Leg Sprite: https://data.abuledu.org/wp/?LOM=801

All other assets were made by us.

Fonts Used:

Public Pixel Font (https://www.fontspace.com/public-pixel-font-f72305)

Pixel Tactical Font (https://www.fontspace.com/pixel-tactical-font-f21509)

This was the first game that I worked on that put narrative and art first. Bit ironic that I did it in a jam based off ms paint. Hey, at least I didn't need to stress over the art too much. It was also the first game jam I worked on it with someone. Roshi was a great person to work with! Honestly I really enjoyed the process of this game. Me and Roshi should be making game devlogs for the game soon, so then you can see the full experience of making it. Thanks for playing and reading this!

-PotatoNato

That's amazing PotatoNato! I wanna die!

-Roshi
